extendedInfo.description: Enter Epic Citadel, the dynamic fantasy setting of the award-winning Infinity Blade.From the circus bazaar to the sweeping cathedral in the center of town, Epic Citadel dazzles with a visual parade of special effects, as only imagined by Epic Games and powered by the critically acclaimed Unreal Engine 3.Are you ready to explore the realm of the Epic Citadel and all the beautiful secrets it holds?Epic Citadel was created using the same tools and technology used to develop high-end console games, now delivered for Android devices!Unreal Engine 3 for mobile gaming platforms is scalable yet packed with the same tools hundreds of thousands of users work with to create games, simulations and animated content.â¢ Enjoy amazing visuals and explore the stunning Epic Citadel kingdom grounds!â¢ Measure the performance of your Android device with Benchmarking Mode, which includes summary readouts with frames per second, screen resolution and quality setting details.â¢ Experience stunning Unreal Engine 3 graphics! Unreal Lightmass global illumination provides beautiful lighting and shadows. Realistic reflections, dynamic movement of trees and banners, and filmic light effects enhance the lifelike environment.

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S IV is the New UNREAL. . .
reviews.comment: Man I simply Love the S4 Graphics on this device are Awesome. There is not at all lag on this and my Benchmark shows 59.6 FPS at Full HD High Quality. S4 ROCKS & UNREAL TOO.....
reviews.author: Anil Rathod

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Could be better, but please increase the  smoothness of the graphics for Samsung galaxy tab 2. Other than that, the game was great
reviews.author: Cynthia Widyanti

reviews.title: Good benchmark tools
reviews.comment: I use this to benchmark several devices. It was great. Maybe you can add some animate objects in it, like villagers or soldiers or animal, to fully test the power of new GPU.
reviews.author: TRINH HUYNH Quang Canh

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Great game, but you need to update the fact that you should get objectives and stuff to do,than that the game was great!!  9/10  See ya!!!
reviews.author: Angus Parker

reviews.title: Good graphic.
reviews.comment: This game have the best graphic which I had never seen on android devices before. But sadly, there is not much to play. My friend and I are really waiting for a \'real game\' come from you. Something like infinity blade on ios.
reviews.author: Brian TRAN

reviews.title: It\'s a benchmark
reviews.comment: It seems like an excellent benchmark tool. Perhaps a very good tool to see if your device can handle a game built on the Unreal Engine 3
reviews.author: Scott Nielson

reviews.title: G. NOTE II
reviews.comment: 46fps on high quality setting.  Really smooth and it was like having a psvita on my hands.  Not bad for a 2yrs old Mali400mp gpu.. Still performed good all this years.
reviews.author: Alam Perwira

reviews.title: Archos gamepad
reviews.comment: Awesome!!! Very nice graphics.... 54fps high quality on my gamepad.. with custom firmware..
reviews.author: Andrew Batino

reviews.title: Runs at the highest setting on my HTC One
reviews.comment: Benchmarked my HTC and got great results. The engine renders the level beautifuly.
reviews.author: Jose Gomez

reviews.title: Huh?
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what am I suppose to doing, I just exploring a castle? And didn\'t have any objectives. And don\'t have any enemies,and  when I look at the sky. My view was like wtf.
reviews.author: Andika Dwi Rahmat

reviews.title: 42.1 fps on S3.
reviews.comment: One question, are there normal maps? Or just images? Objects and textures  are really beautiful, so I can\'t guess..
reviews.author: Henrik Hakobyan

reviews.title: Simply amazing on S4
reviews.comment: Graphics maxed out in settings with no loss of frame rate, it runs smoothly and flawlessly, I love epic games :)))
reviews.author: David Cassidy

reviews.title: 41fps on galaxy s4 ?
reviews.comment: I have know idea why my quad core s4 is unable to get 60fps as everyone else.
reviews.author: Robert Featherman

reviews.title: Good googly moogly!
reviews.comment: If they can do this on a phone imagine what they could do on a machine with real power!
reviews.author: Dan Carwright

reviews.title: Stunning!
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe the quality of the graphics on my S4! This is an awesome, AWESOME demo that showcases what phones are now capable of. Graphics on this are better than The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion, and even some other 360 games!
reviews.author: Jeremy Gardner

reviews.title: Love the graphics
reviews.comment: I really love the grsphics and there was no lag,but you kniww,after exploring for more thnn an hour, i findnit bored cause u got ntb to do, i mean like, nothing to accomplish, its a game that you can walk where ever you wsnt and thats it? Make something muchnmore fun, you got the graphics right, now, you justneed to make like quests or make a game like swlrdart online or draggonedt (dn is a pc gamw) thats how u rule the world with games, ya know what im talking abt?
reviews.author: ikakirinkato danish

reviews.title: Very nice. But only a test
reviews.comment: Everything is working and it is easy to use. No manual needed.
reviews.author: Frank Bergmann

reviews.title: Runs great!
reviews.comment: Game works great. Can run the settings on the middle option without no performance loss.  Highest is still playable with a bit of slowdown.
reviews.author: Martin Grondein

reviews.comment: Game sucks graphics are cool but theres not much gameplay just looking
reviews.author: BEST DRIVERS

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Great work. 42avg fps on s3 4.1.2
reviews.author: Danijel Korunek
